nl.strohalm.cyclos.webservices.payments

Interface PaymentWebService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PaymentWebServiceImpl

    public interface PaymentWebService
    Web service interfaces for payments
    Author:
    luis

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ChargebackResult chargeback(java.lang.Long transferId)
      Performs a chargeback, returning the status, the original transfer and the chargeback transfer
      PaymentResult confirmPayment(ConfirmPaymentParameters params)
      Confirms a payment originated from another channel
      java.util.List<ChargebackResult> doBulkChargeback(java.util.List<java.lang.Long> transfersIds) 
      java.util.List<PaymentResult> doBulkPayment(java.util.List<PaymentParameters> params)
      Performs several payments under the same transaction payment, returning the status and the transfer data for each payment
      java.util.List<ChargebackResult> doBulkReverse(java.util.List<java.lang.String> traces) 
      PaymentResult doPayment(PaymentParameters params)
      Performs a payment, returning the status and the transfer data
      boolean expireTicket(java.lang.String ticket)
      Expires the given ticket, invalidating it, returning whether the ticket was expired
      RequestPaymentResult requestPaymentConfirmation(RequestPaymentParameters params)
      Makes a payment request, in order to be confirmed in another channel
      ChargebackResult reverse(java.lang.String traceNumber)
      Performs a reverse, returning the status, the original transfer and the chargeback transfer
      PaymentStatus simulatePayment(PaymentParameters params)
      Check whether a payment would be executed, returning the status, without actually performing it
